divs: Sighting DetailsWe were at our neighbors backyard star gazing. We saw several satellites and would point them out with a green laser. I had just pointed out one I found directly overhead headed south from north. It suddenly flash two times suprising everyone. Very bright flashes I might add. It continued on its way south and disappeared.
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Tucson
There were no other sightings in Tucson on or around March 29th 2013
Summary: Watching satellite and it suddenly flashed at us.
